name: Mech
description: These NPCs are ambulatory, mechanized cavalry units (like the PCs).

name: Vehicle
description: These NPCs are vehicles of various descriptions, other than mechs and ships.

name: Ship
description: These NPCs are vehicles capable of space and atmospheric travel.

name: Biological
description: These NPCs don’t have a Heat Cap, are immune to tech actions other than Scan and Lock On (including beneficial ones), and can’t take tech actions unless specified.

name: Squad
description: These NPCs aren’t individual people – instead, they are a large squad of smaller enemies that act together.
